summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Department of Parks and Recreation and to the Central Waterfront Park, authorizing a preliminary re-appraisal of Piers 55 and 56 and making an appropriation from the Park Acquisition and Development Fund for such re-appraisal and for expenses of the Law and Engineering Departments in connection with the acquisition by condemnation of Pier 59 under Ordinance 101454.
